data.name: RPG Maker MV - Useful Window Glass Tiles
data.detailed_description:
This is a versatile glassware tileset.
This collection is designed to use easily with the tileset, including RPG Maker MV.

Try to leverage this product to create a variety of landscape expressions, such as shops with stylish shop windows, dungeons with transparent floors, building walls, and partitions.

---------------------------------
◆Material
・tileset x１（tileset B recommended）

◆Sample project
・map x 4 (using this tileset)
---------------------------------

◆Notes.◆
※The buildings in the screenshots are the RPG Maker MV tilesets.
Note: This product contains only the glass window tileset.
※When using the transparency feature, you should use the gait settings and the tileset layer feature.
